title: The End is Nigh (The Apocalypse Triptych
description:
The End is Nigh (The Apocalypse Triptych) [Kindle Edition]
John Joseph Adams (Author), Hugh Howey (Author), Jamie Ford (Author), Paolo Bacigalupi (Author), Seanan McGuire (Author), Sarah Langan (Author), Nancy Kress (Author), Jonathan Maberry (Author), Tananarive Due (Author), Scott Sigler (Author)
 <a href="
http://bayimg.com/mALBFaAFp" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://bayimg.com/mALBFaAFp</a>



350 pages.

Epub.



Note to the authors:
Sorry for stealing your stories.  If you accepted direct payment and offered direct download of a DRM free copy, I would have bought it.  I also understand if that's not feasible.
If you could create a Bitcoin address on your website(s) for donations or payments, I would pay my share.  I'd gladly send you $7 rather than Amazon.

Fuck Amazon and fuck Kindle DRM crappy bullshit.
